transcript: only losers should fear recessions if you are a winner then all that happens is you just get to eat everyone else's lunch like that's all it is everyone else who shouldn't have been in business now will not be in business and then whatever little crumbs and whatnot just filters up to the guys who provide value so it's still business fundamentals it's just you get away with less the rules of the game don't change you just provide more value at a at a really reasonable price you do all the things about being better you contact your leads you follow up you make sure you do an email marketing I mean like you're doing all the things you should be doing it works in any economy
